title: Zuca Arq Project - Full Stack development (stack MERN + Claudinary)
description: New project for ZUCA brand in Argentina. Full Stack development with Redux, MongoDB, cloudinary. Backend deployed on Render.com, Frontend on Vercel.

title: Indire Project - Full Stack development (React Js + PWF + Microsoft Graph)
description: Application for building renovations. Frontend in React, utilizes OneDrive as database. Works offline as PWA. Project currently in development.

title: Migrating from a static project to a scalable one in React
description: Article comparing two projects: one in React and one static. Discusses differences in technologies, design, and file structure.

title: ITenseno Project
description: Recent project aimed at IT students. Backend work showcased with Postman. Videos demonstrate API features.

title: Migration from Heroku app to Railway
description: First LinkedIn article detailing migration from Heroku to Railway for hosting.

title: New project in React and new goals achieved!
description: Personal growth and achievements shared. React project deployed on Render.com & Railway.app.
